title: Robbed of my money
body: I find it kind of great my friend who gifted us had a issue recently with his card and it got declined understandable yous can take back the champion he gifted I get that but the fact I bought skins for this champion and yous cant refund any of my stuff? I want my skins refunded and the fact yous are locking me out from money I spent is ridiculous I seriously need to speak with like a higher up employee I'm not standing here and getting locked out from the money I spent this is ridiculous I even talked to someone just asking refund my skins then because I can't buy zed (the champion that was taken back) any time soon and now the money I spent is locked ?

replies.body: I don't have the full context to your situation, so I can't offer much value here.  Due to the nature of sensitive account information, this isn't something we can assist with on the boards.  You'll want to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look at your case and assist individually.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
